help.base: help: List all allowed commands and w

options.[command]: Display information about a specific command

clear: clear: Clear terminal screen and command history
echo: echo [text]: Print text to terminal screen
whoami: whoami: Display current logged in user
hostname: hostname: Display name of host system
repo: repo: Open GitHub repository for this project

contact.base: contact: Print contact information and links

options.-m <message> [-from <your name/email>]: Send an email containing some message. Optionally, include who you are :)
